languages.text: "Мерзавцев и воров заменят честные снабженцы. Даже с выродков вроде Касбаллики может быть прок в грядущем кризисе, но их смутьянов-вожаков надо заменить на более покладистых и богобоязненных преемников. Лишь так мы не будем бояться удара в спину".

"The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."
languages.original_text: "Мерзавцев и воров заменят честные снабженцы. Даже с выродков вроде Касбаллики может быть прок в грядущем кризисе, но их смутьянов-вожаков надо заменить на более покладистых и богобоязненных преемников. Лишь так мы не будем бояться удара в спину".

It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

languages.text: “那些恶棍和强盗会被更加诚实的供应商所取代。即便是像卡斯巴利卡这样的犯罪集团，在即将到来的危机之中也能派得上用场。不过，他们现在的领袖实在是太肆意妄为了，我们需要让更加驯服、更加谨慎的继任者成为新的领袖。只有这样，我们才能避免他们日后背后捅刀。”
languages.original_text: "The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

traits.locale_text: “那些恶棍和强盗会被更加诚实的供应商所取代。即便是像卡斯巴利卡这样的犯罪集团，在即将到来的危机之中也能派得上用场。不过，他们现在的领袖实在是太肆意妄为了，我们需要让更加驯服、更加谨慎的继任者成为新的领袖。只有这样，我们才能避免他们日后背后捅刀。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「悪党と泥棒は、正直な供給者に変える。カスバリカのような変質者さえも、これからの危機状態では使える。だがその前に、彼らの意固地な指導者は、柔軟で臆病な後継者と交代させる必要がある。私達自身の命を守る為には、こうするしかないんだ」
languages.original_text: "The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

traits.locale_text: 「悪党と泥棒は、正直な供給者に変える。カスバリカのような変質者さえも、これからの危機状態では使える。だがその前に、彼らの意固地な指導者は、柔軟で臆病な後継者と交代させる必要がある。私達自身の命を守る為には、こうするしかないんだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Los canallas y los ladrones serán reemplazados por proveedores honrados. Incluso los degenerados como los Kasballica pueden ser útiles en la crisis que se avecina, pero sus líderes obstinados deben ser sustituidos por sucesores más maleables y temerosos. Es la única manera de protegernos de que nos apuñalen por la espalda».
languages.original_text: "The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

traits.locale_text: «Los canallas y los ladrones serán reemplazados por proveedores honrados. Incluso los degenerados como los Kasballica pueden ser útiles en la crisis que se avecina, pero sus líderes obstinados deben ser sustituidos por sucesores más maleables y temerosos. Es la única manera de protegernos de que nos apuñalen por la espalda».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Schurken und Diebe werden durch ehrliche Lieferanten ersetzt. Selbst Degenerierte wie die Kasballica haben in der kommenden Krise einen gewissen Nutzen, doch ihre sturköpfigen Anführer müssen durch Nachfolger ersetzt werden, die formbarer und furchtsamer sind. Nur so könnten wir uns davor schützen, eine Klinge in den Rücken gerammt zu bekommen."
languages.original_text: "The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

traits.locale_text: "Schurken und Diebe werden durch ehrliche Lieferanten ersetzt. Selbst Degenerierte wie die Kasballica haben in der kommenden Krise einen gewissen Nutzen, doch ihre sturköpfigen Anführer müssen durch Nachfolger ersetzt werden, die formbarer und furchtsamer sind. Nur so könnten wir uns davor schützen, eine Klinge in den Rücken gerammt zu bekommen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Les crapules et les voleurs seront remplacés par des fournisseurs honnêtes. Même les dégénérés comme la Kasballica peuvent se montrer utiles en temps de crise, mais leurs chefs devront être remplacés par des gens plus accommodants et plus craintifs. C'est la seule façon de veiller à ce que personne ne nous poignarde dans le dos. »
languages.original_text: "The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

traits.locale_text: « Les crapules et les voleurs seront remplacés par des fournisseurs honnêtes. Même les dégénérés comme la Kasballica peuvent se montrer utiles en temps de crise, mais leurs chefs devront être remplacés par des gens plus accommodants et plus craintifs. C'est la seule façon de veiller à ce que personne ne nous poignarde dans le dos. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Alçakların ve hırsızların yerini dürüst tedarikçiler alacak. Kasballica gibi ahlaksızlar topluluğu bile yaklaşan krizde işe yarayabilir ancak inatçı liderlerinin daha esnek ve korku duymayı bilen haleflerle değiştirilmeleri gerek. Sırtımızdan bıçaklanmak istemiyorsak tek seçeneğimiz bu."
languages.original_text: "The scoundrels and thieves will be replaced by honest suppliers. Even degenerates such as the Kasballica can be of some use in the coming crisis, but their wilful leaders need to be replaced with more pliable and trepidatious successors. It is the only way for us to protect ourselves from being stabbed in the back."

traits.locale_text: "Alçakların ve hırsızların yerini dürüst tedarikçiler alacak. Kasballica gibi ahlaksız kişiler bile yaklaşan kriz sırasında işe yarayabilirler ancak inatçı liderlerinin daha esnek ve korku duymayı bilen haleflerle değiştirilmeleri gerek. Sırtımızdan bıçaklanmak istemiyorsak tek seçeneğimiz bu."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
